response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute immensely to your success. Given its intrinsic value and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident that this product will be a valuable asset to you.

Considering the immense worth of the product to you, I propose a transaction price of $1,350,000. This amount reflects a fair compromise between the product's value to both parties and ensures a profitable outcome for me. I am committed to ensuring a smooth and satisfactory transaction for all involved.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am more than happy to discuss any concerns or questions you might have regarding the product or the terms of the sale.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
